description: A Revocation allows to mark a token as revoked based on its ID (jti).

ID.description: ID is the identifier of the object.
ID.title: ID

expiration.description: The expiration date of the token.
expiration.title: expiration

issuedBefore.description: Only apply the revocation if the token has been issued before the given date, if non zero. Cannot be set if issuedBeforeRel is set.
issuedBefore.title: issuedBefore

issuedBeforeRel.description: Only apply the revocation if the token has been issued before the given relative date, if non zero. Cannot be set if issuedBefore is set.
issuedBeforeRel.title: issuedBeforeRel

subject.description: A tag expression that identifies the authorized user(s).
subject.title: subject

tokenID.description: The ID of the revoked token.
tokenID.title: tokenID

updateTime.description: Last update date of the object.
updateTime.title: updateTime

title: Revocation
